alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:29PM MST until July 21 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Pima County in southeastern Arizona... West central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 730 PM MST. * At 627 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Saguaro National Park East, or 15 miles northwest of Benson, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Benson, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Vail, Corona De Tucson, Saguaro National Park East, Rita Ranch and Mescal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
